title: How to Make Pineapple Upside Down Cake Jello Shots

steps.headline: Dissolve the gelatin into the boiling water in a large bowl.
Measure and pour the schnapps, vodka, Irish cream, and cold water into the bowl.
steps.description: Thoroughly stir until well mixed. Allow the mixture to cool a little.

steps.headline: Add a maraschino cherry in plastic shot cups.
Carefully pour the Jello mixture over the cherries.
Chill in the refrigerator to allow the mixture to fully set and harden.

text: Dissolve the gelatin into the boiling water in a large bowl.  Measure and pour the schnapps, vodka, Irish cream, and cold water into the bowl. Thoroughly stir until well mixed. Allow the mixture to cool a little. Add a maraschino cherry in plastic shot cups.  Carefully pour the Jello mixture over the cherries.  Chill in the refrigerator to allow the mixture to fully set and harden.  Finished.
